experience1.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: Develop and maintain web applications using React, Node.js and MongoDB.
Implementation of microservices architecture and CI/CD to improve scalability.
Leadership of a team of 5 developers and mentoring junior developers.
Performance optimization that resulted in a 40% improvement in page load times.

experience2.title: Web Developer
description: Development of websites and applications for clients from various sectors.
Implementation of e-commerce solutions using Symfony and PHP.
Collaboration with UX/UI designers to implement attractive and functional interfaces.
Database optimization and SQL queries to improve performance.

experience3.title: Junior Developer
description: Frontend development using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
Contribution to the development of a hybrid mobile application with Ionic.
Implementation of unit and integration tests.
Bug fixes and performance improvements in existing applications.
